messages.zh: 第五关（前）
messages.en: level 5(pre)

messages.zh: 果然一直在尾随我们吗，整合运动......！
messages.en: You’ve been tailing us all along, Reunion Movement……!

messages.zh: 你们挣扎的样子，勾起我们的兴趣了。
messages.en: The way you struggled, drew our interest.

messages.zh: 放着不管的话，你们就会像沟渠里的杂碎一样溜走。
messages.en: If left alone, you’ll slip away like rats in the sewers.

messages.zh: ——一个也别想逃出去。
messages.en: ——Not a single one of you can escape.

messages.zh: 我们被包围了......！
messages.en: We’re surrounded……!

messages.zh: 这个数量......究竟有多少暴徒藏匿在切城？！
messages.en: This number……how many mobsters are there hidden in Chernobog?!

messages.zh: ——动手。
messages.en: ——Engage.

messages.zh: ——狙击小队，瞄准敌方指挥官！
messages.en: ——Sniper squad, aim for the enemy commander!

messages.zh: 重装干员，防御姿态，向前顶上！
messages.en: Shield operators, defensive stance, move up!

messages.zh: 等一下，等一下——
messages.en: Hold on, hold on——

messages.zh: 这里已经是我的处理范围咯。
messages.en: This is within my range of responsibilities now.

messages.zh: 该交给我了吧，弑君者？
messages.en: Time to hand over to me right, Crownslayer?

messages.zh: 你没有拒绝的理由吧？一些小虫子......值得你亲自追击吗？
messages.en: You don’t have any reason to refuse right? Just a few pests……are they worth your effort?

messages.zh: 随便你。
messages.en: As you wish.

messages.zh: 收队。
messages.en: Retreat.
……What……?

messages.zh: ......这小子，是来战场上玩闹的吗？
messages.en: ……This kiddle, is he here on the battlefield to have fun?

messages.zh: 你们在盘算什么？
messages.en: What are you planning?

messages.zh: 抱歉，我都没来及和你们打招呼。
messages.en: Apologies, I haven’t greeted you yet.

messages.zh: 毕竟刚开始你们并不是整合运动的目标。
messages.en: After all, you weren’t Reunion Movement’s target in the beginning.

messages.zh: 我叫梅菲斯特，是整合运动的领袖——
messages.en: I am Mephisto,the leader of Reunion Movement——

messages.zh: 你们的战斗我看的一清二楚。
messages.en: I took in all your battles.

messages.zh: 真的——十分有趣！
messages.en: It was——so very interesting!

messages.zh: 说战场的厮杀......有趣？
messages.en: He calls slaughter on the battlefield……interesting?

messages.zh: 我决定——要和你们，好好玩上一会儿才行~
messages.en: I’ve decided——that I’ll have a lot of fun with you~

messages.zh: ......我们没工夫和小孩子浪费时间。
messages.en: ……We don’t have time to waste with kids.

messages.zh: ......刚刚那是什么？信号吗？
messages.en: ……What was that? A signal?

messages.zh: 与你无关。
messages.en: None of your business.

messages.zh: 你们，是叫罗德岛吗。我还以为你们和账面上一样是制药公司呢。
messages.en: You, are called Rhodes Islands right. I thought you are a pharmaceutical company like on the records.

messages.zh: 都是些企业人士了，连谈话时要注意礼节这个道理都不明白吗？
messages.en: Being business people, don’t you even know about etiquettes in a conversation?

messages.zh: 我没心情正眼看一个混球。
messages.en: I don’t have that heart for a bastard.

messages.zh: 就是因为世上你这种混球越来越多，才导致我们不得不提防着点。
messages.en: The increasing number of bastards like you in this world, is the reason we have to watch out for ourselves.

messages.zh: 是嘛。
messages.en: Is that so.

messages.zh: 但是我不一样。
messages.en: But I am different.

messages.zh: 我为之前对你们的轻视而向你道歉。
messages.en: I apologize for looking down on you before.

messages.zh: 你们战斗的时候十分英勇，又非常懂得怎么取悦我！
messages.en: You are very brave in battle, and you know very well how to please me!

messages.zh: 我们来玩个游戏吧。
messages.en: Let’s play a game.

messages.zh: ......你疯了？天灾要来了！再不撤出就逃不掉了——
messages.en: ……Are you crazy? The Calamity is coming! Now is the only chance to escape——

messages.zh: 你在说什么呢，迟钝兔子？
messages.en: What are you talking about, dumb rabbit?
Urgh?!

messages.zh: 正因为是天灾啊......一个该庆祝的时刻——！现在，狩猎罗德岛的活动，正式开始啦。
messages.en: Exactly because of the Calamity……a time to rejoice! Now, the hunt for Rhodes Island, officially begins.

messages.zh: 就用你们的血，来祝福切尔诺伯格即将焕然一新的绚烂时刻吧！
messages.en: Let’s use your blood, to give blessing to this gorgeous time of transformation for Chernobog!

messages.zh: 哦哦！！哦哦哦！！！
messages.en: Hurrah!! Hurrahhh!!!

messages.zh: 啐，这臭小子，脑袋里的东西搅成一团了吗？
messages.en: Psst, this little bastard, is his brain completely screwed?

messages.zh: 但我也不是那种冷血的人......
messages.en: But I’m not a cold blooded person either……

messages.zh: 所以我会给你们一个机会，一个允许你们暂时逃离命运的机会。
messages.en: So I’ll give you a chance, a chance for you to escape the fate for now.

messages.zh: 接下来的战斗中，我不会出手~
messages.en: In the following battles, I won’t join the fight myself~

messages.zh: 很仁慈吧？当然，就算你们现在想投降，也是不可能的哦。
messages.en: Very kind of me right? Of course, it’s impossible for you to surrender now.

messages.zh: 因为狩猎——已经开始了！
messages.en: Because the hunt——has begun!

messages.zh: 各小队，战斗准备！！
messages.en: All squadrons, prepare for combat!!

messages.zh: 对了对了。
messages.en: Oh, and I almost forgot.

messages.zh: 那个从核心区石棺里捞出来的家伙......非常、非常令人在意。
messages.en: That guy you salvaged from the confinement in the core zone……he’s very, very intriguing.

messages.zh: 你看起来......和我们有点不一样。
messages.en: You look……a little different from us.

messages.zh: 来吧，罗德岛的虫子们，把这个家伙留给我吧？这样你们说不定还能先逃一会儿呢。
messages.en: Come on, Rhodes Island bugs, why not give him to me? You might have a bit more time to run this way.

messages.zh: 博士——
messages.en: Doctor——

messages.zh: ——退到我身后！！！！
messages.en: ——Get behind my back!!!!
